Charles Jeandey

Developpeur Web PHP Laravel

Contact Me →

Laravel

Laravel is a web application framework with expressive, elegant syntax. We believe development must be an enjoyable and creative experience to be truly fulfilling. Laravel takes the pain out of development by easing common tasks used in many web projects.

VueJS

Vue est un framework évolutif pour construire des interfaces utilisateur. À la différence des autres frameworks monolithiques, Vue a été conçu et pensé pour pouvoir être adopté de manière incrémentale.

TailwindCSS

A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs. Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework that gives you all of the building blocks you need to build bespoke designs without any annoying opinionated styles you have to fight to override.

Livewire

Livewire is a full-stack framework for Laravel that makes building dynamic interfaces simple, without leaving the comfort of Laravel.

AlpineJS

Alpine.js offers you the reactive and declarative nature of big frameworks like Vue or React at a much lower cost.

VuePress

VuePress generates pre-rendered static HTML for each page, and runs as an SPA once a page is loaded.

Bonjour!

Ce site a été fait avec VuePress! 🤠



 




Route::get('home', function () {
      return 'Bonjour à tous!';
    });

# Laravel


return Destination::orderByDesc(
    Flight::select('arrived_at')
        ->whereColumn('destination_id', 'destinations.id')
        ->orderBy('arrived_at', 'desc')
        ->limit(1)
)->get();

# VueJS


<template>
    <div class="counter">
        <h1>{{number}}</h1>
        <button @click = "decrement">-</button>
        <button @click = "increment">+</button>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
    export default {
        data(){
            return{
                number: 0,
            }
        },
        methods:{
            increment(){
                if(this.number >= 0){
                    this.number++
                }
            },
            decrement(){
                if(this.number > 0){
                    this.number --
                }
            }
        }
    }
</script>

# Livewire


use Livewire\Component;

class SearchUsers extends Component
{
    public $search = '';

    public function render()
    {
        return view('livewire.search-users', [
            'users' => User::where('username', $this->search)->get(),
        ]);
    }
}

# Alpine JS


<div x-data="{ open: false }">
    <button @click="open = true">Open Dropdown</button>

    <ul
        x-show="open"
        @click.away="open = false"
    >
        Dropdown Body
    </ul>
</div>

# Git & Github

  • GitHub est un service web d'hébergement et de gestion de développement de logiciels, utilisant le logiciel de gestion de versions Git.

On branch master
Your branch is up to date with 'origin/master'.

Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add/rm <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
